lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kylw bsq bbUr kY inkt qwNih; swlq hYN sUrYN Awpw skY n bcwie jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as leaves of a plaintain tree are torn by the thorns of an acacia tree growing within its proximity, it can not free itself from the hold of the thorns without damaging itself.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ kylw jo ik`kr dy nyVy v`sdw hY aus nUM ik`kr dIAwˆ sUlwˆ ivMnH su`tdIAwˆ hn qy auh Awpw bcw nhIˆ skdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ipMjrI mY sUAw pVq gwQw Anyk; idnpRiq hyriq iblweI AMiq Kwie jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a parrot in a small cage learns much but he is watched by a cat who one day catches it and eats it up.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ Coty ipMjry ivc qoqw Anyk g`lwˆ pVHdw hY, pr ib`lI hr roz aus nUM dyKdI rihMdI hY AMq dwA l`gx qy aus nUM Kw jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy jl AMqr mudq mn hoq mIn; mws lptwie lyq bnCI lgwie jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a fish feels happy living in water but an angler throws the bait tied at the end of a strong thread and the fish is enticed to eat it. When the fish bites the bait, it bites the hook as well making it convenient for the angler to pull it out.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ pwxI AMdr m`CI pRsMn mn huMdI hY, pr iSkwrI bMsI nwl mws cmoVky qy pwxI ivc bMsI lw ky m`CI nUM PV lYˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: ibn siqgur swD imlq AswD sMig; AMg AMg durmiq giq pRgtwie jI [634[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, without meeting the God-like True Guru, and keeping company of base people, one acquires base wisdom that becomes the cause of his falling in the hands of angels of death.  (634)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ swDU siqgurU qoˆ ibnwˆ AswDUAwˆ Koty purSwˆ nwl imilAwˆ AMg AMg ivc durmq dI durgqI pRgt ho pYˆdI hY ]634]
